sentences.en: Anchorage technology is an important means of reinforce in the mine engineering.
sentences.cn: 锚固技术是矿山工程中加固的一种重要手段.

sentences.en: And take measures to reinforce them. Please set your mind at rest.
sentences.cn: 并采取措施加固. 请放心好了.

sentences.en: Both sides have been reinforcing their positions after yesterday's fierce fighting.
sentences.cn: 在昨天的激战后，双方一直在增援各自的阵地。

sentences.en: I hope this will reinforce Indonesian determination to deal with this kind of threat.
sentences.cn: 我希望这会加强印度尼西亚对付这类威胁的决心。

sentences.en: Kissing also reinforce pair bonding, helping to maintain relationships.
sentences.cn: 亲吻也加强一对人的接合, 帮助维护双方的关系.

sentences.en: Like most emergent phenomena, wear is liable to self - reinforce.
sentences.cn: 与多数自发现象相仿, 磨损有 自我 巩固的倾向.

sentences.en: Rather, they should reinforce checks and balances and stimulate a debate.
sentences.cn: 相反, 他们应当加强相互制衡,并激发讨论.

sentences.en: Reinforce and extend your understanding of accountingproperty , plant, and equipment.
sentences.cn: 强化和延伸您对权益 、 厂房与设备的理解.

sentences.en: Schools should try to reinforce positive behavior patterns in children.
sentences.cn: 学校应该努力强化孩子们那些积极的行为方式.

sentences.en: So how do we reinforce the modern concept of nationalism?
sentences.cn: 那么,如何才能确立现代爱国主义的价值观 呢 ?

sentences.en: Such jokes tend to reinforce racial stereotypes.
sentences.cn: 这样的笑话容易渲染种族偏见。

sentences.en: Teacher use praises and rewards to reinforce children's positive behaves.
sentences.cn: 老师们运用赞美及奖励来强化孩子们正面的行为.

sentences.en: The film reinforces the idea that women should be pretty and dumb.
sentences.cn: 这部影片强化了这个观点——女人要漂亮，而且要笨一些。

sentences.en: They rushed a brigade of puppet troops to reinforce the area.
sentences.cn: 他们赶运了一旅伪军来增援这个地区.

sentences.en: Through helping others, members reinforce their own sobriety and build up self - esteem .
sentences.cn: 通过帮助别人, 会员们加强了自我节制并逐步树立了 自尊心.

sentences.en: We should reinforce the river embankment before the wet season.
sentences.cn: 雨季前夕,我们要加固河坝.

sentences.en: Your positive response will reinforce her actions.
sentences.cn: 你积极的回应会使她的行为更加坚定。

words.tran_cn: 增强剂；加强件；增强材料；强化刺激

trans.tran_en: to give support to an opinion, idea, or feeling, and make it stronger

trans.tran_cn: 求援，得到增援，给予更多的支持

trans.tran_en: to give support to an opinion, idea, or feeling, and make it stronger
